This was a fantastic experience and dinner.  A small and quaint place, with great service.  We ordered the three course option and would highly recommend it.   Each course had 4 - 5 options to choose from.  The mussels were outstanding (Thai curry sauce) and the dessert was delicious - exceeded our expectation.  We found the place through a server (Oscar) at our hotel, Olivia Balmes.  If you are looking for a non-tapas dinner out but authentic Spanish food...definitely would recommend this place.  Make a reservation to be safe.
